I'll loose it if they find something.  I can't do this ever again.

Posts.Content: Jan 11, 2010 09:48AM DancingDeb81 wrote: Hi Everyone I just started reading your post.  I have had 18 rad treatments with 12 more to go.  I don't have any redness or burning.  But I've lost range of motion and have pain under my are.  Seems like a tendon is pulling and I can't straighten it.  I wonder if it's the radiation or did I do too much during the Holidays.  It feels just like it did right after my surgery.  Lumpectomy and 8 lymps removed.  Any thoughts?
Posts.Title: December 2009 Rads Group Linda_NJ BonnieSF
